name: HabitCoachJackieInspiration&Interviews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite inspiring source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.


This skill provides interviews by inspiring professionals as well as helpful habit hacking and positive mindset monologue. 


Expect interviews usually weekly and monologues Monday to Friday. No updates on the weekends. 


Topics have included how to break bad habits, how to be confident without being seen as a b-word, and other helpful tricks to inspired and emPower you to be your best self.

Some meditations will sneak in, different components of the PressPlay lifestyle coaching system, and other mindfulness practices to get you unstuck and out of your own way.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
